extendedInfo.description: Achievement checklist for Ghost Recon: Future Soldier on the Xbox 360, to keep track of your progress towards 1170 gamer points.. All 57 Achievements included. This includes the Arctic Strike and Raven Strike DLC Achievements.. Descriptions for all 57 Achievements. Your achievement progress is automatically saved when a checkbox is pressed.. Your achievement progress is automatically loaded when you relaunch the application. The Achievement description is shown when a row is pressedDisclaimerThis is an unofficial educational guide created by Dev4WebApps. All trademarks and copyrights referenced are the property of their respective owners and are used under the fair use doctrine. Dev4WebApps and this application are in no way affiliated with Ubisoft.
